overview: Bennett University (Times Group) in Noida/Greater Noida offers industry-led management programs with strong corporate partnerships, modern infrastructure, and an emphasis on experiential learning. The School of Management runs MBA and BBA programs with specialization options and a practice-driven curriculum aligned to current business needs.

fees.notes: Scholarships and financial aid available based on merit and criteria.

highlights: Dedicated career services and industry mentorship
